thread.title: Liberal Southern Education Foundation and New Venture Fund pushing #Initiative42 with $2.6 million
thread.title_full: Liberal Southern Education Foundation and New Venture Fund pushing #Initiative42 with $2.6 million

author: Frank Corder
title: Liberal Southern Education Foundation and New Venture Fund pushing #Initiative42 with $2.6 million
text: Money for school-funding issue traced to 3 big donors A political action committee — Better Schools, Better Jobs — supports the measure. All but $6,500 of the $2.6 million raised by the committee has come from two charities, the Southern Education Foundation and the New Venture Fund. Kellogg, Molpus and Barksdale are giving something more than $1.6 million to the charities. WJTV Posted October 5, 2015 - 5:05 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
